<a id="AudioStreamPlaybackInteractive"></a>

# AudioStreamPlaybackInteractive

**Inherits:** [AudioStreamPlayback](AudioStreamPlayback.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Playback component of [AudioStreamInteractive](AudioStreamInteractive.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Playback component of [AudioStreamInteractive](AudioStreamInteractive.md). Contains functions to change the currently played clip.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AudioStreamPlaybackInteractive_method_get_current_clip_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_current_clip_index**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioStreamPlaybackInteractive_method_get_current_clip_index)

Return the index of the currently playing clip. You can use this to get the name of the currently playing clip with [AudioStreamInteractive.get_clip_name()](AudioStreamInteractive.md#AudioStreamInteractive_method_get_clip_name).

\ **Example:** Get the currently playing clip name from inside an [AudioStreamPlayer](AudioStreamPlayer.md) node.




```gdscript
    var playing_clip_name = stream.get_clip_name(get_stream_playback().get_current_clip_index())
```
